/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, teeming with life and activity. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is a hive of movement, with numerous cars and buses navigating their way through the urban maze. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, painting a picture of a cityscape that is both vibrant and serene. The overcast sky adds a touch of melancholy to the scene, contrasting with the dynamic energy of the city below.
